name: Halloween Knight (itch)
description:
Unmask the Truth!

Entry for Spooktober Jam 2020

Controls: 

Mouse/GamePad Right Stick: Look

WASD/Game Pad Left Stick: Move

Left Click/Game Pad Bottom Face Button: Flashlight

Assets:

Cemetery VOL.1 - Dekogon Studios 

Gothic Knight - TalkingDrums

Meadow Environment Set - NatureManufacture

Immersive Dark Ambient Music Pack - W.O.W Sound

Modular Fantasy House - Next Level 3D

Amplify LUT Pack - Amplify Creations

Animation - Adobe Mixamo

SFX - Soundly

Made with Unreal Engine, Blender, Krita, and GIMP

Halloween Knight - © 2020 Clayton Campbell - https://urist999.itch.io/

Happy Halloween!
